source.title: Sheet
source.description: Slide-out panel component extending Radix Dialog for sidebars, settings panels, and mobile menus. Side prop positions content at top, right, bottom, or left edges with CSS width customisation.

source.title: Shadcn Sheet (Unofficial)
source.description: Extended Sheet patterns including settings panels, navigation drawers, mobile action sheets, notification bars. API reference for SheetContent side prop, SheetHeader, SheetFooter, SheetClose with production tips.

source.title: Field
source.description: Field component family for accessible forms: Field, FieldSet, FieldGroup, FieldLabel, FieldContent, FieldDescription, FieldError, FieldSeparator. Supports vertical/horizontal/responsive orientations, validation states, choice cards, semantic fieldset grouping.

source.title: TanStack Form
source.description: TanStack Form integration with useForm hook, Zod schema validation, Field component composition. Validation modes (onChange, onBlur, onSubmit), error display, field types (input, textarea, select, checkbox, radio, switch), array fields with pushValue/removeValue.

source.title: Button
source.description: Button component with variants (default, outline, ghost, destructive, secondary, link), sizes (sm, default, lg, icon, icon-sm, icon-lg), automatic icon spacing, Spinner loading state, asChild for polymorphic rendering, ButtonGroup composition.

source.title: Sonner
source.description: Toast notification component using Sonner library. Toaster setup in app layout, toast() function, success/error/warning/info/loading variants, lucide icons customisation, next-themes integration, CSS variables styling.

source.title: Shadcn Sonner (Unofficial)
source.description: Extended Sonner toast patterns with success, error, loading states, toast.promise() async handling, custom JSX content, undo actions, persistent notifications, duration control, icon customisation, position configuration.

source.title: MCP Server
source.description: Model Context Protocol server enabling AI assistants (Claude Code, Cursor, VS Code, Codex) to browse, search, and install components via natural language. Covers `npx shadcn mcp init`, registry namespaces, authentication headers, troubleshooting.

source.title: shadcn
source.description: CLI reference for `npx shadcn init`, `add`, `view`, `search`, `list`, and `build` commands. Flags like --template, --base-color, --overwrite, --all, --path, --silent, --cwd, namespaced registry syntax, registry JSON generation.

source.title: components.json
source.description: Project configuration schema for style, Tailwind CSS (config path, css, baseColor, cssVariables, prefix), rsc, tsx, aliases (components, utils, ui, lib, hooks), registries with namespaced URLs, authentication headers, environment variable expansion.

source.title: Theming
source.description: CSS variables theming with oklch colour format, background/foreground naming convention, complete variable list (primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, ring, chart, sidebar), @theme inline directive, base palettes (neutral, stone, zinc, gray, slate).

source.title: Empty
source.description: Empty state placeholder component with EmptyHeader, EmptyMedia (icon/avatar variants), EmptyTitle, EmptyDescription, EmptyContent subcomponents. Supports outline borders, gradient backgrounds, avatar groups, InputGroup integration, call-to-action buttons.

source.title: Item
source.description: Versatile flex container with ItemMedia (icons, avatars, images), ItemContent, ItemTitle, ItemDescription, ItemActions, ItemHeader, ItemFooter. Variants (default, outline, muted), sizes (default, sm), ItemGroup for lists, ItemSeparator, asChild for links.

source.title: Sidebar
source.description: Composable sidebar with SidebarProvider, useSidebar hook, collapsible modes (offcanvas, icon, none), variants (sidebar, floating, inset), SidebarMenu with buttons/actions/submenus/badges/skeletons, groups, header/footer, CSS variables theming, keyboard shortcuts, cookie persistence.

source.title: Navigation Menu
source.description: Radix UI navigation menu with NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuLink, NavigationMenuIndicator, NavigationMenuViewport. Supports asChild prop for Next.js Link integration and dropdown navigation patterns.

source.title: Drawer
source.description: Mobile-friendly slide-up panel built on Vaul library with gesture support. DrawerTrigger, DrawerContent, DrawerHeader, DrawerFooter subcomponents, and responsive Dialog/Drawer pattern for desktop/mobile switching.

source.title: Shadcn Drawer (Unofficial)
source.description: Extended Drawer patterns with Vaul gestures, snap points, multi-direction support (bottom, top, left, right), nested drawers, controlled state. API reference, responsive dialog-drawer strategy, and production tips.

source.title: Badge
source.description: Small label component for status indicators, tags, and counts. Variants: default, outline, secondary, destructive. Supports asChild prop for polymorphic rendering as links via Next.js Link component.

source.title: LLMs.txt
source.description: Machine-readable component index for AI assistants listing all shadcn/ui components by category: form/input, layout/navigation, overlays/dialogs, feedback/status, display/media. Links to dark mode, forms, monorepo, registry, MCP server docs.

source.title: Input Group
source.description: InputGroup component for enhancing inputs/textareas with icons, text, buttons, tooltips, spinners, labels, dropdowns. InputGroupAddon with inline-start/end, block-start/end alignment, InputGroupButton variants, custom input via data-slot attribute.

source.title: Native Select
source.description: Styled native HTML select with NativeSelect, NativeSelectOption, NativeSelectOptGroup. Option grouping, disabled/invalid states, aria-invalid validation, React Hook Form integration, InputGroup compatibility, mobile-optimised native dropdowns.

source.title: Spinner
source.description: Loading indicator component with animate-spin animation. Customisable size via size-* utilities, colour via text-* utilities, replaceable icon, integration examples with Button, Badge, InputGroup, Empty, Item components.

source.title: Registry Item JSON Schema Examples
source.description: JSON examples for registry:style, registry:theme, registry:block types. Covers cssVars, @layer CSS, @utility, @import, @plugin Tailwind, @keyframes animations, envVars, universal items.

source.title: Registry System Introduction
source.description: Overview of shadcn CLI registry for distributing components, hooks, pages, configs, and rules. Framework-agnostic system works with React, Vue, Svelte, or any project type.

source.title: Registry Setup and Build Guide
source.description: Configure registry.json, define items with files and dependencies, build with `shadcn build`, serve from public/r/. Guidelines for registryDependencies, @/registry imports, and `shadcn add` installation.

source.title: Changelog 2025 (newest-first)
source.description: 2025 release history (newest-first). Post-May: npx shadcn create with visual styles Vega/Nova/Maia/Lyra/Mira (Dec), Registry directory (Nov), CLI 3.0 with namespaced registries and MCP server (Aug), October components (Spinner, Field, Item, ButtonGroup), universal registry items, radix-ui migration. Earlier: Tailwind v4, blocks.

source.title: Registry Directory - shadcn/ui
source.description: Directory of 90+ community component registries with zero-config @namespace installation. Includes MagicUI, Aceternity, assistant-ui. Links to registry setup, authentication, and MCP server docs.
